name: state/content/switch
description: Switch to an existing open content item (set as current/highlighted tab). Does NOT add to openItems - use content/open for that.

params.name: userId
params.description: User ID whose content state to modify

params.name: contentItemId
params.description: ID of the content item to switch to (must already be in openItems)

results.name: error
results.description: Error message if operation failed (e.g., item not found in openItems)

examples.description: Switch to an existing open tab
